Near01: I wanna see the full thing...
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>One of the <clr:0000>bones in this cutie's spine<clr:ffff>
is detached.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>Every step I took on the long walk
here, I thought,<sp:5:1:0> "I can't wait to see the
<clr:0000>fully intact leviathan fossil<clr:ffff>."
<sp:3:0:2:0300>I bet the <clr:0000>missing bones<clr:ffff> are still right
nearby too...
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>How adorable do you think they'll be?
My money's on SUPER adorable!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>What am I doing waiting around here?<sp:5:1:0>
I've got to hit the road! Wait for me, cute
little leviathan—I'm coming for you!
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>After all that walking, I was really
hoping to see the leviathan fully intact...
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>You...<sp:5:0:0>fixed it? <sp:5:1:0>You fixed it! <sp:5:0:0>Look at that—
it's good as new!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Ahhh... Take a moment to drink it all in.
Those elegant fins, that rigid back...
It's simply breathtaking!
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>O-oh, OK. I was hoping we could talk
fossils again...
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I really can't thank you enough for fixing
my precious leviathan.

This is for you.<sp:5:0:0> It's the least I can do
after getting to see such a darling fossil!
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sigh>Oh, I wish I could see it all together! I'd
pay anything for one good look at it.
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I'd love to stay here gazing...<sp:5:1:0>but there's
still <clr:0000>one more<clr:ffff> leviathan out there!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>They've been waiting for me for years,
and I don't wanna make them wait even
a second more!
The last <clr:0000>leviathan is in the Gerudo region<clr:ffff>.
So that's my next stop!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Actually, let me see your <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>.
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Are you seeing what I'm seeing?!<sp:5:0:0>
How adorable is the sharp, little mouth
on this leviathan skeleton?
He looks so different from the one in
Eldin too. Maybe he's another species?<sp:0:4:0>Or should I say "she"? What if they're the
same species, but one's a boy and one's
a girl!<sp:5:0:0> Oh, it's just so fascinating!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sigh_00>Which makes it even sadder...<sp:5:1:0>that some of
this little dumpling's <clr:0000>bones are missing<clr:ffff>.
